name: Housekeeping Staff
description: Clean rooms and common areas, report maintenance issues.

name: Waiter/Waitress
description: Serve tables and maintain high service standards.

name: Delivery Driver
description: Deliver plants and garden materials to clients.

name: Office Cleaner
description: Evening cleaning shifts for office buildings downtown.

name: Front Desk Receptionist
description: Greet guests, manage bookings, assist with inquiries and payments.

name: Sous Chef
description: Assist the head chef in daily kitchen operations.

name: Junior Web Developer
description: Maintain and update client websites using GitHub workflows.

name: IT Support Technician
description: Provide first-line support for server and network issues.

name: Store Manager
description: Oversee plant shop operations, handle inventory and customer orders.

name: Cleaning Crew Member
description: Perform scheduled cleaning of residential properties.
